channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Jokey transforms Poet into Gargamel's Mom in 'Funny Mommy', then in 'Smurfy Day Care', Storm has to become a super smurfsitter when all of the Smurfs turn back into babies. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Lucky comes to stay over in 'Paddington's Pet Hotel', and then in 'Paddington Plays Golf', Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says? (S2, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Captain Daddy Dog; Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a story to help them fall asleep in 'Bedtime Story', and then in 'Lost Keys', Peppa and her family have been to a mountain beauty spot, when Daddy Pig loses the keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Dinosaur is replaced with a newer model in 'George's New Dinosaur', while in 'Grandpa Pig's Train To The Rescue', Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, full of passengers who need to get to work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone at playgroup has brought in their pets for 'The Pet Competition', and then in 'Spider Web', Mummy Pig finds a spider in the house and orders Daddy Pig to please move it into the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Brown is talking about selling the house in 'Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens', then in 'Paddington Helps a Hedgehog', the kids are playing in the garden and make a prickly discovery. (S2, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharknapped!: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend! (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Pandy's Birthday: It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Leaf gets sick, causing some wild climate changes in 'Leaf's Under the Weather', then in 'House Call', Gargamel gets sick, and the Smurfs feel obliged to help him. (S2, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse in 'Pups Save the Squirrels', then in 'Pups Save a Roo', when a joey is separated from its mother, it's up to the pups to save a roo and the day! (S6, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire in 'Pups Stop a Super Shaker', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse', Farmer Al has a wild dream that his animals start acting like humans. (S8, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Rangers: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden, and embark on a hiking adventure! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Noisy Night; Wishing Well: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is leaving (don't worry, not really) in 'Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party', and then in 'The Queen', Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's award for industry, for all the work she does.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef turns a garden cactus into nopales in 'Nopales Tacos', then in 'Sloppy Joes', Chef tries to keep his new apron clean. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Desert Island: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them. He realises he misses the sea.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Perfume: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The school roof has a leak again, so the children raise money for a new roof in 'Children's Fete', then in 'The Aquarium', Goldie the Goldfish is feeling lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns have unbelievable new neighbours in 'Paddington's New Neighbour', and in 'Paddington Makes the News', Paddington, Jonathan & Judy create a newspaper but need a front page story! (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington in 'Paddington Shares A Good Deed', then in 'Paddington Goes Green', Paddington learns about composting, and tries to grow flowers for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.
